about_the_game:
Installing this DLC you will see a lot of adult content such as sex animation in the game.
It will add 6 sex animations in dreams.

content_descriptors.notes: After the DLC is installed, the naked scene will appear in the dream.

detailed_description:
Installing this DLC you will see a lot of adult content such as sex animation in the game.

name: DreamEater H Scene

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
